summary: Linda and Eta, two 14-year-old girls, best of friends, retreat to a secluded beach beneath the cliffs of Dubrovnik; the morning after, only one of them returns.
cast: Mirjana Karanovic|Marija Skaricic|Leon Lucev|Franjo Dijak|Petra Vukelic|Perica Martinovic|Sylvie Marinkovic|Maja Zeco|Marija Tadic|Lucia Radulovic|Edi Jertec|Ines Cokaric
title: Cure: The Life of Another
